title: Ambassador to tell lawmakers that Trump directed Giuliani to push Ukraine to investigate the Bidens
text:
U.S. Ambassador to the European Union Gordon Sondland will tell Congress on Thursday that President Trump directed his personal attorney, Rudolph W. Giuliani, to prod Ukraine for an investigation into former Vice President Joseph R. Biden and his son Hunter, according to prepared testimony obtained by The Washington Times.

“My understanding was that the president directed Mr. Giuliani’s participation, that Mr. Giuliani was expressing the concerns of the president,” Mr. Sondland will say, according to the remarks.
